      • Pipe

        public Pipe(int x1,
            int y1,
            Pipe.Orientation or,
            int length,
            int width,
            java.awt.Color c)
        The constructor for the pipe
        Parameters:
        x1 - The X position
        y1 - The Y position
        or - The orientation
        length - The length of the pipe (make it negative to make the particles flow backwards)
        width - The width of the pipe
        c - The color

      • setTime

        public void setTime(int time)
        Sets the amount of time it takes the paricles to move a bit on the pipe
